title: Bee Day at the library
maintext:
About 30 children and their parents gathered for the Bee Day informational presentation at 1 p.m. Monday at the Ludington Library to learn about basic knowledge of honey bees.
Lenny Feldberg, cofounder of Scottville Area Beekeepers Club, led the event, along with the help of Sue Carlson, the Mason County District Library assistant director and head of children’s services. Since the event was geared toward children, Feldberg said, “We try to keep it simple, (and) they have great questions.”
To read the full story, check out the daily Notable section in today’s print or e-edition of the Ludington Daily News.
